features: CLEAR & REFLECTIVE: Please PEEL OFF the transparent protective film on the front mirror side and you will get a clear reflection
SELF ADHESIVE MIRROR: with strong self adhesive, just peel and stick, please NOTE the acrylic mirror can only stick on clean smooth and flat surface
NON GLASS SAFETY MIRROR: made of acrylic material, shatterproof & not easy to break, with rounded corners, much safer than regular glass mirror
LIGHTWEIGHT: thickness - 0.08" (2 mm), makes the mirror ultra light and super easy to install, image equal to a glass one
17" x 12" LARGE SIZE: great for Classroom, Camping, Nursing home, RV, perfect for Baby Playroom and Kids room, dresser, for Pet, Horses or Chicken Coop

Note - Please peel off the transparent protective film on the front mirror side, in order to get a clear reflection Package Includes 1 * Acrylic Mirror Sheet Measurements L x W - 17 inch x 12 inch Thickness - 2 mm Material - Acrylic Wide Range of Application Great for Classroom, Living Room Decoration, Camping, Fun House, perfect plastic mirror for Baby Playroom and Kids room. Easy to stick and remove Covered with Protective Film The mirror sheet is covered with protective film, protecting the mirror surface from damaging or scratching, please peel off the transparent film when use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: image was good. unbreakable. adhered to wall. Not big enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a 2 year old
reviews.reviewText: My Autistic daughter who is two loves looking at herself and this mirror allowed her to do so with no problem of the mirror breaking or anything like that. It’s sticks to almost anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent mirror, poor adhesive
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mirror to set up a Montessori style play area for my 17 month old. It arrived in great condition and was easy to set up. I made sure to follow the instructions carefully so that the product would adhere properly to the wall but it still fell off after just a few hours. I had to adhere the mirror with my own command strips so that I can still use the it.I still like the mirror for being a safe for kids, clear, and in a size that works for my intended use. My son uses it several times a day, all day for peak a boo and to watch himself sing, dance, and play. Just expect to buy your own command strips to adhere it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Depends on what you're looking for...
reviews.reviewText: My wife suggested this for the garage above an industrial sink we installed there. This is not a true mirror, meaning it is flexible and will reflect a fun-house mirror effect that gets worse as you back away from it. However, at 2-3' away, this is not bothersome. I read complaints about the mirror's lack of adhesiveness. So, I peeled off the adhesive backing paper and than papered over the adhesive (basically blocking it). I used double-sized velcro tape along the left and right sides to attach it. I blocked the adhesive to prevent it from attracting dust and bugs. This worked well. The mirror is not going anywhere. Unless it want it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fun house carnival mirror
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 3 of these for my garage gym. Set up one of them on a flat surface but the reflection is super distorted. Stay away from this one.

reviews.reviewerName: I received a tester, not a real product. Very disappointed
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for this price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this mirror being that it is acrylic and not glass. It worked for the project I was doing but I cracked it while trying to cut it so I will probably be getting another one eventually. Great mirror!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great unbreakable mirror!
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used it to hang up so I can't judge ease of installation or how well it stays up. But it's great for traveling!!! I'm a drag entertainer and with that comes traveling and sometimes having to get ready in some not so desirable areas, especially in the summer time with special events like prides and so on. So it's nice to have a mirror you can travel with and not have to worry about it breaking!! Has great reflection like any nice mirror but is flexible!
These ‘mirrors’ bend out of shape when exposed to any type of sunlight or heat - and so they just fall off whatever surface they are stuck to. SO DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.

reviews.reviewTitle: Garbage, kept falling off the wall, but glued to my floor without issue
reviews.reviewText: Cleaned the wall thoroughly with rubbing alcohol. Stuck it on. Twice. It kept falling within 24 hours, no pulling or anything, just literally falling off the wall. Eventually it fell onto my linoleum floor and stuck to it! I had to rip it off, and it left glue behind. It's a complete mess that I'm now struggling to remove from my floor. Threw this thing straight into the garbage. The mirror quality was fine, but you're better off paying $12 for an actual acrylic mirror and hanging it with command strips than dealing with this mess.
